Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), haskell-devscripts-minimal | haskell-devscripts (>= 0.13), dh-sequence-haskell, ghc, ghc-prof, libghc-adjunctions-dev (<< 4.5), libghc-adjunctions-prof, libghc-distributive-dev (<< 0.7), libghc-distributive-prof, libghc-infinite-list-dev (<< 0.2), libghc-infinite-list-prof, libghc-primitive-dev (<< 0.10), libghc-primitive-prof, libghc-vector-dev (<< 0.14), libghc-vector-prof, libghc-quickcheck2-dev (>= 2.10), libghc-quickcheck2-dev (<< 2.17), libghc-quickcheck2-prof, libghc-tasty-dev (<< 1.6), libghc-tasty-prof, libghc-tasty-hunit-dev (<< 0.11), libghc-tasty-hunit-prof, libghc-tasty-quickcheck-dev (<< 0.12), libghc-tasty-quickcheck-prof, libghc-tasty-smallcheck-dev (<< 0.9), libghc-tasty-smallcheck-prof
Build-Depends-Indep: ghc-doc, libghc-adjunctions-doc, libghc-distributive-doc, libghc-infinite-list-doc, libghc-primitive-doc, libghc-vector-doc
Package-List: libghc-chimera-dev deb haskell optional arch=any libghc-chimera-doc deb doc optional arch=all libghc-chimera-prof deb haskell optional arch=any
